---
title: "ggplot2 in R"
author: "Tony Duan"

execute:
  warning: false
  error: false
format:
  html:
    toc: true
    toc-location: right
    code-fold: show
    code-tools: true
    number-sections: true
    code-block-bg: true
    code-block-border-left: "#31BAE9"
---


![](images/Screenshot 2023-07-08 at 5.03.46 PM.png){width="800"}


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
library(ggpubr)
library(ggthemr)

library(ggplot2)
packageVersion("ggplot2")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] '3.5.0'
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(reshape2)
tips=tips
head(tips)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
  total_bill  tip    sex smoker day   time size
1      16.99 1.01 Female     No Sun Dinner    2
2      10.34 1.66   Male     No Sun Dinner    3
3      21.01 3.50   Male     No Sun Dinner    3
4      23.68 3.31   Male     No Sun Dinner    2
5      24.59 3.61 Female     No Sun Dinner    4
6      25.29 4.71   Male     No Sun Dinner    4
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data001=gapminder
head(data001)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 6 Ã— 6
  country     continent  year lifeExp      pop gdpPercap
  <fct>       <fct>     <int>   <dbl>    <int>     <dbl>
1 Afghanistan Asia       1952    28.8  8425333      779.
2 Afghanistan Asia       1957    30.3  9240934      821.
3 Afghanistan Asia       1962    32.0 10267083      853.
4 Afghanistan Asia       1967    34.0 11537966      836.
5 Afghanistan Asia       1972    36.1 13079460      740.
6 Afghanistan Asia       1977    38.4 14880372      786.
```


:::
:::



# Scatter Plot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p=ggplot(tips, aes(tip, total_bill)) + geom_point()
p
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](1-ggplot2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## color by group


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p=ggplot(tips, aes(tip, total_bill,color=sex)) + geom_point()
p
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](1-ggplot2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## size by group


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p=ggplot(tips, aes(tip, total_bill,colour = sex,size=size)) + geom_point()
p
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](1-ggplot2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## line Plot

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data002= data001 %>% group_by(continent,year) %>% summarise(pop=sum(pop))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p=ggplot(data002 %>%filter(continent=='Asia'), aes(year, pop)) + geom_line()
p
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](1-ggplot2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## color by group



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p=ggplot(data002, aes(year, pop,colour = continent)) + geom_line()
p
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](1-ggplot2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# histogram


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data002= data001 %>% filter(year==1997,continent %in% c('Asia','Africa'))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data002, aes(gdpPercap)) + 
  geom_histogram()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](1-ggplot2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## color by group


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data002, aes(gdpPercap,,fill = continent)) +geom_histogram(position = 'dodge')
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](1-ggplot2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# bar chart


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data002= data001 %>% filter(year==1997) %>% group_by(continent) %>% summarise(pop=sum(pop))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data002, aes(x=continent, y=pop)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity")+scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](1-ggplot2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



# box plot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p=ggplot(tips, aes(day,tip,fill=day)) + geom_boxplot()
p
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](1-ggplot2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::




## color by group



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p=ggplot(tips, aes(day,tip,fill=sex)) + geom_boxplot()
p
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](1-ggplot2_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
